attributes.review:
DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. This is a campaign app and it forces you to work for Donald Trump. As a lifetime Trump Supporter, I was upset that I was being asked to call others and find events near me. This is not my campaign to run and I DO NOT want to be enslaved to this campaign.

I just wanted to see news about how great my president is. That would be better.
attributes.title: Useless

attributes.review: and not to mention rapist, anyway this app took several days to download, and i kept trying to open it and would crash and my phone is now glitching and stuff, I have to say tho this app gets one star because daddy trump needs to get out of office✨💅🧚🏻‍♀️✨
attributes.title: horrible, homophobic, racist

attributes.review: I am a trump supporter and right after I downloaded the app, I started to get random texts from different numbers. It was all spam. The app hacked my phone and gave my phone number to random websites. Most of the links they kept sending lead to porn websites. I thought trump was a president I could trust.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: this is completely trash it hacked into my data and i’m not very happy with the results 😡✨ worst app i’ve ever downloaded can’t believe i wasted my time downloading this, complete waste of storage 🤡🤏🏼 i don’t recommend getting this AT ALLLL complete TRASH 🗑 i would rate this app with a 0/10 waste of time. goodbye ❤️✨
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see how our lovely racist, sexist, selfish president was doing and the first photo that popped up on the screen was revolting. our president standing on the front screen looking like a slug with an american flag in the background. it also asked me for my phone number, which i believe is a little too forward and i also feel as though the app could be stealing my information because of the shady stuff the president is known to do. in short, don’t get this app. or do, only if it’s for this
attributes.title: terribly designed

attributes.review: I downloaded it and it took 2 days to finish in the first place. After words I went into it and my phone shut down and I tried again and the same thing happened. Finally, after a million tries, I got in and it stole my information and wiped my phone.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This app was horrible and basic human rights should be left alone quit the rallies on sacred ground, tragedies just so you can be elected again. Honestly, everything about this year is horrible and learning about this app made it ✨💫even worse🌸⭐️thanks but no thanks🍬🌈✨🌟
attributes.title: ✨⚡️amazing app🌸🥀 now take it down💕🌈❤️

attributes.review: First off this app took so long to load just like its Gonna take y’all a long time to realize he’s a rapist. SECOND of all.. the app quality is horrible smh just like his leardership skills..honestly this app doesn’t deserve a 1 star I would give it a 0 star rating if I could..
attributes.title: 😎terrible just like trump.

attributes.review: This app was incredibly disappointing just like our president and should be removed immediately! Very hard to use and asks for too much information, why do they need all my info? What are they going to do with it?? 🤔🤬🤬🤬 DO NOT use this app it’s useless
attributes.title: Very disappointed 😡

attributes.review: As soon as I open the app my phone started to glitch out and it shut down. It took a whole 4 hours of trying to get it back to work. Finally my phone turned on and all of my data was whipped out. I do not recommend this app.
attributes.title: Terrible app
